dt: {bc}an ornamental tuft (as of feathers) especially on a helmet

dt.t: The palace guard had a {wi}panache{/wi} on his helmet.

dt: {bc}dash or flamboyance in style and action {bc}{sx|verve||}

dt.t: flashed his … smile and waved with the {wi}panache{/wi} of a big-city mayor

et: Middle French {it}pennache{/it}, from Old Italian {it}pennacchio{/it}, from Late Latin {it}pinnaculum{/it} small wing {ma}{mat|pinnacle|}{/ma}
shortdef: an ornamental tuft (as of feathers) especially on a helmet
dash or flamboyance in style and action : verve
